question: Which e-commerce company has launched ‘MarQ TurboStream’ streaming stick recently in India?
explanation: Flipkart has launched a streaming stick under its private brand \'MarQ by Flipkart. The price starts at ₹3,499. The ‘MarQ TurboStream’ device is equipped with the latest Android 9.0 OS and leverages the familiarity, ease, and functionality of Google’s widely popular operating system.  With the Android operating system being so popular in the country, the user interface of the streaming device will be familiar and will help customers adapt to the new technology quickly.
